summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Madison Street from Third Avenue to Ninth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for such reinforced concrete sidewalks and retaining walls as may be found necessary, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1830 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
